This privacy policy covers personal information, including any information we collect, use and share from you, as described further below. This privacy policy applies to all websites in the Dealy NYC undertakings, our services, communications, and our mobile applications (collectively, the “Services”). This privacy policy does not cover how our Clients may use or share data that they collect using our Services.
When you obtain a Service from us, your personal information will be collected, used, and shared consistent with the provisions of this privacy policy as well as the following addendums related to particular services offered by Dealy NYC, which are also a part of this privacy policy:
Addendum (reserved for future use)

How We Use Your Information
Sharing of Information

Signing Uli for Services; User Information

Information Covered by this Privacy Policy
Information We Collect from You

or 282 11th Ave., #608. NY. NY 10001. For the purposes of the REGULATION (EU) 2016/679 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation), Dealy NYC has no European local representatives.
If you have any questions about this privacy policy or the practices described herein, you may contact

Dealy NYC (Dealy NYC hereafter) and our subsidiaries (“we,” “us” or “Dealy NYC”) are an online platform, for natural persons (consumers) and undertakings (businesses) (collectively, “our Users” or “Clients” hereafter) to find each other and the best geo-determined deals. While catering to the needs of our Clients, we exercise prudence in protecting the personal information of our Clients who use our website, mobile applications or services. This privacy policy provides details about how your personal information is collected, shared and used by us. To learn more about Dealy NYC, visit: www.dealynyc.com.

Geo - Advertising – doing business as Dealy NYC – is a US based deal and discovery platform, piloting business concept in the NYC market. The proprietary delivery platform utilizes its users’ phone locations and preferences to curate the best real-time offers available across a multitude of businesses such as restaurants, spas, and places of shopping and entertainment in your neighborhood.
Inform us within 30 days of the purchase and we will refund the money – no-questions-asked.
However, in case the purchase doesn’t match up to your expectations or if you were unable to use the voucher within the time frame or perhaps you changed your mind, don’t worry.
We want you to have a good experience each time you avail a Dealy offer. Our retail partners have been selected after careful consideration.
Every deal that is featured on Dealy is backed by the Dealy promise. You can rest assured that your purchases on Dealy are safe and will be honored.

Browse through the categories; filter your search based on price, popularity and customer rating. Once you narrow down and select your experience, complete the transaction using one of the payment methods. You will receive a voucher code which can be redeemed at the merchant’s location.
Yes. You can download the app free of charge on Google Play Store and iOS App Store.

Anyone who has the app can avail of the offers. You just need to register on the app using your Email ID and mobile number. Alternatively you can sign in using your Facebook, Gmail or Twitter account.

Dealy helps you explore the best deals in the city enabling you to enjoy great experiences at great pries. The deals delivery platform uses your phone location to curate real-time offers available across a wide range of categories in and around your area.
How do I select the best deal?
How long is each offer for?
We would love to chat with you and hear your thoughts. Please reach out to us on support@dealynyc.com
How can I share my feedback or ideas with Dealy?
You can cancel the order within 30 days of purchase. We will refund the money.
I changed my mind, can I cancel the purchase order?

Offers vary. While some offers are available for a few hours only, others could be valid for a day or two. There are new offers that are added in real time. Dealy will notify you about the latest offers in your neighborhood so that you can take maximum advantage.

There are no hidden costs. The amount mentioned is inclusive of all taxes.
The expiry date and terms and conditions are mentioned in every offer.
Legal Basis for Processing Your Information

Please read the following Terms and Conditions of use carefully before using this website. All users of this site agree that access to and use of this website is subject to the following terms and conditions and other applicable law.
The offer cannot be combined with any other offer
Every voucher has an expiry date which is specifically mentioned on the voucher and at the time purchase.
To avail the deal, please share the voucher code with the retail partner.
Vouchers can be redeemed only after due verification of the customer (inc.customer ID)
Bookings, reservations and amendments are subject to availability.
The voucher must be redeemed in a single visit unless specified otherwise.
Taxes on the services or products rendered or sold is the sole responsibility of the merchant.
To view the best deal around you
